content: whether you have a ton of yarn you d like to use up or you want to make a mindless colorful blanket you re going to love the double strand scrap blanket this crochet pattern is easy beginner friendly and works up fairly quickly for a blanket this pattern is worked by holding a double strand throughout the entire blanket and only uses the half_double_crochet stitch one of the great things about this blanket is you can make it completely your own use the colors you have in your stash you don t have to make even row but i do think you should separate each color with a line of white because it s nice to differentiate the colors i can t wait to see what you come up with and how you make this double strand scrap blanket your own be sure to post your projects on ravelry i would love to see them
